FAST SHIPPING & DELIVERY

Hallmark customers get fast & reliable shipping on all orders. Free Shipping for all orders.

FREE RETURNS

We’re temporarily extending the return windows to make your holiday shopping easier and stress free! Items ordered through HallmarkDiamonds starting November 1, 2021 will have their return window extended to January 15th, 2022.
settings.tabDescription3:
Hallmark Diamonds provides a 1-year warranty on all your fine jewelry purchased from HallmarkDiamondsCollection.com. The warranty covers manufacturers defects in material or workmanship but it does not cover neglect or abuse.

WARRANTY EXCEPTIONS & EXCLUSIONS
The Hallmark Diamonds warranty does NOT cover the following items:

Any damage to your jewelry purchase due to negligence or abuse. (For Example: If a stone is lost due to bent, damaged, or worn out prongs, Hallmark Diamonds is not responsible for the replacement of the stone or the re-tipping of the prongs. If the jewelry was neglected and abused and the warranty becomes void.)

If another jeweler performs any repair or resizing work on an item purchased from HallmarkDiamondsCollection.com we will not be held responsible for any loss or defect and the warranty becomes null and void.

settings.title: About Hallmark
settings.text: For more than 110 years, Hallmark has been helping make the world a more emotionally connected place and striving to make a genuine difference in every life, everyday - whether it’s through capturing and celebrating meaningful milestones or the little everyday moments in between. We help make people’s relationships, moments and stories tangible. We help you feel close to what matters most.

settings.title: About Hallmark Diamonds
settings.text: Hallmark Diamonds is inspired by the power of emotional connections, our personal stories, and sharing what’s in our hearts. Each piece is designed using timeless icons that represent the special moments, milestones and relationships in our lives- the things that define our life story. High-quality craftsmanship, deep meaning, and great value are key in creating treasures you’ll love forever. Whether it’s a gift for yourself or someone else, a Hallmark Diamonds piece will celebrate your story for years to come.
